item.title: scp Nant Task - 'scp' failed to start. The system cannot find the file specified
item.description: I was trying to make use of the Nant Contrib scp task earlier and was getting an error message which at the time seemed a bit strange (now of course having solve the problem it is obvious!) This was the task I was running: <scp file="someFile.txt" server="some.secure-server.com" /> This was the error: 'scp' failed to start. The system cannot find the file specified I ran it in debug mode to try and see what was going on and got this stack trace:
